tables.table_schema:
CREATE TABLE HeatingCoolingSchedule (
  building_id INT,
  date DATE,
  occupancy_time TIME,
  heating_temp FLOAT,
  cooling_temp FLOAT
)

CREATE TABLE temperature_schedule (
   schedule_id UUID PRIMARY KEY,
   building_id UUID,
   heating_start_time TIME,
   heating_end_time TIME,
   cooling_start_time TIME,
   cooling_end_time TIME,
   FOREIGN KEY (building_id) REFERENCES building_occupancy_data(building_id)
);

CREATE TABLE Schedule (
    schedule_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    building_id INT,
    schedule_date DATE NOT NULL,
    heating_temp INT NOT NULL,
    cooling_temp INT NOT NULL
);

CREATE TABLE heating_schedule (
    building_id INT,
    schedule_date DATE,
    start_time TIME,
    end_time TIME,
    temperature FLOAT
);

CREATE TABLE cooling_schedule (
    building_id INT,
    schedule_date DATE,
    start_time TIME,
    end_time TIME,
    temperature FLOAT
);
